title: Video Production Manager - Pro Sports
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. â„¢ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Video Production Manager Posted/Updated: 10-07-2015 Brief Job Description: Plan and create video and LED content for teams marketing campaigns, in-arena video board shows, corporate partnerships and community relations initiatives.   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
